N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2206.1 - Payment

State Regulations

General awards and academic performance awards shall be
paid by the corporation or by the Comptroller at the request of the corporation
directly to institutions of higher education for the benefit of each eligible
student. During the initial academic year a college or vocational institution
or branch of a college or vocational institution shall offer approved programs, the president may make payments and prepayments to the college or vocational
institution or branch thereof in installments, in trust, or under such other
terms and conditions as the president may deem necessary, to assure such
payments shall be expended consistent with statutory and regulatory
requirements or shall be available for application to the payment of refunds
due. Notes
